title: Joint sitting offers ‘Fateha’ for train’s victims
content:
ISLAMABAD, Aug 07 (APP): The Joint Sitting of the Parliament Monday offered Fateha for victims of yesterday’s train accident in Nawabshah, a police official martyred in an attack in Khyber-Pakhtunkhwa (KP) and children drown at Turbat.
Maulana Abdul Akbar Chitrali led the Fateha at request of the Speaker Raja Pervaiz Ashraf.
The house also prayed for early recovery of those injured in the train accident.
